driver.title: Driver
driver.description: Driver used to connect to the Database.

host.title: Hostname
host.description: Hostname or IP address used to connect to the Database.

port.title: Port
port.description: Not required if the MongoDB connection URI is set.

database.title: Database Name
database.description: Database name on which data will be stored.

acquireRetry.title: Connection Acquiry Attempts
acquireRetry.description: Number of retries if the first connection acquiry attempt fails (default: 1)

maxIdleTime.title: Maximum Idle Time
maxIdleTime.description: Maximum idle time of the connection in the pool in millis (default: 1800000)

maxLifeTime.title: Maximum Life Time
maxLifeTime.description: Maximum life time of the connection in the pool in millis (default: 0)

maxAcquireTime.title: Maximum Acquiring Time
maxAcquireTime.description: Maximum time to acquire connection from pool in millis (default: 0)

maxCreateConnectionTime.title: Maximum Creation Time
maxCreateConnectionTime.description: Maximum time to create a new connection in millis (default: 0)

validationQuery.title: Validation Query
validationQuery.description: Query that will be executed to validate that a connection to the database is still alive.

tableSuffix.title: Table Suffix
tableSuffix.description: The table name which is containing all the reports start with 'report_audits' and finish with this suffix (max length : 30).

bulkActions.title: Bulk actions
bulkActions.description: Number of requests action before flush

flushInterval.title: Bulk flush interval
flushInterval.description: Flush interval for bulk actions in seconds
